sections.summary:
Results-oriented accountant with strong work ethic and over four years of experience.Â Successful at managing multiple projects and consistently
meeting deadlines under pressure. Bi-lingual in English and Spanish with outstanding analytical, oral and written communication skills across all
levels of the organization. Extensive knowledge of accounting software and processes.
